jd: From: Mayank Mer, Pivotal mayank.mer@pivotal-technologies.com Reply to: mayank.mer@pivotal-technologies.com " US health insurance implementation experience with Facets " Role : Facet Developer Visa : U.S. citizenship Only Location : Remote Facets Developer – C# and SQL for agile development for a Facets implementation role. This Developer position will participate in a team environment for the delivery and code for a Facets testing and implementation. Responsible for programming, debugging and testing of applications in a development environment. Generally responsible for database design and system testing. ROLE & RESPONSIBILITIES • Strong healthcare domain knowledge (Healthcare Terminology). • Work experience in design develop solutions for inbound and outbound interfaces using PL/SQL and C#.NET. • Code review and unit testing • Release management best practices systems optimization environmental validation and issue resolution. • Good understanding of the Facets Data Model and work experience in building Facets extension • Familiar with the Core Facets batch jobs and EDI transactions (835 and 837). • Understand functional specs and create a detailed technical design (technical Design document). • Hands-on knowledge with Sqlserver, Facets, Unix and Tidal Scheduler. • Support defect remediation, QA and release management procedures REQUIREMENTS: • Experience with: • Facets customization development, working with extensions, integrations and / or data conversions. • Good understanding of Facets data model and Facets batch • .Net, C#, and SQL Server Skills: US health insurance implementation experience with Facets. PL SQL, C#, . NET, SQL server Experience building Facets Extensions Thanks & Regards, Mayank Mer Technical Recruiter
